metadata.Description: Liquefied natural gas (LNG) is natural gas that has been cooled to a liquid state for easier storage and transportation.

level 1.Description: Liquefied natural gas addresses energy access challenges by providing a reliable and cleaner energy source.
Liquefied natural gas employs cryogenic technology for the storage and transportation of natural gas.
Liquefied natural gas collaborates with shipping companies for the transportation of LNG.
Liquefied natural gas supports the clean energy transition by providing a lower-carbon alternative to other fossil fuels.
Liquefied natural gas administers LNG import terminals for the storage and regasification of LNG.
Liquefied natural gas measures greenhouse gas emissions to ensure compliance with environmental regulations.
Liquefied natural gas aligns with energy security objectives by diversifying energy sources.
Liquefied natural gas is an instance of natural gas in its liquid form.

level 2.Subject: energy markets
level 2.Description: Energy markets address the issue of energy access by ensuring the availability and affordability of energy sources for all segments of society.

level 2.Subject: energy markets
level 2.Description: Energy markets employ renewable energy technologies to diversify the energy mix and reduce dependence on fossil fuels.

level 2.Subject: just energy transition
level 2.Description: The just energy transition employs a renewable energy workforce to support the transition to clean energy sources.

level 2.Subject: just energy transition
level 2.Description: The just energy transition collaborates with local communities to ensure a fair and inclusive transition to sustainable energy.

level 2.Subject: energy democracy
level 2.Description: Energy democracy addresses energy inequality by promoting equitable access to clean and affordable energy for all individuals and communities.

level 2.Subject: energy democracy
level 2.Description: Energy democracy employs participatory decision-making processes to ensure that all stakeholders have a voice in shaping energy policies and projects.

level 3.Subject: energy markets
level 3.Description: Energy markets address the issue of energy access by ensuring the availability and affordability of energy sources for all segments of society.

level 3.Subject: renewable energy agencies
level 3.Description: Renewable energy agencies employ experts in the field of renewable energy to drive innovation and promote the adoption of clean energy technologies.

level 3.Subject: climate change scenario analysis
level 3.Description: Climate change scenario analysis implements sustainable energy projects to mitigate the impacts of climate change.

level 3.Subject: renewable energy certificates
level 3.Description: Renewable energy certificates are implemented by the Energy Efficiency Policy to promote the use of renewable energy sources.
